parameter.name: locale
parameter.label: Locale
parameter.description: Supported locale (depends on the provided acoustic model, language model and dictionary)

parameter.name: languageModelPath
parameter.label: Language model path
parameter.description: Location of the language model file. Optional if a grammar is used.

parameter.name: grammarPath
parameter.label: Grammar path
parameter.description: Location of the grammar files. Optional if a language model is used.

parameter.name: grammarName
parameter.label: Grammar name
